org.apache.ddlutils.platform
Class CreationParameters

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.ddlutils.platform.CreationParameters

public class CreationParameters
extends Object

Contains parameters used in the table creation. Note that the definition order is retained (per table), so if a parameter should be applied before some other parameter, then add it before the other one.

Version:
$Revision: 331006 $

addParameter

public void addParameter(Table table,
                         String paramName,
                         String paramValue)
Adds a parameter.

Parameters:
table - The table; if null then the parameter is for all tables

paramValue - The value of the parameter
